title: UPDATE 2-ATP World Tour 250, Memphis Men's Singles Final Rounds and Seeds Progress
text: February 18, 2018 / 11:52 PM / Updated 15 hours ago UPDATE 2-ATP World Tour 250, Memphis Men's Singles Final Rounds and Seeds Progress Reuters Staff 5 Min Read Feb 19 (OPTA) - Final Rounds and Seeds Progress from the ATP World Tour 250, Memphis Men's Singles matches on Sunday ..
